Squizzy::

She looked over at the bots under the sheets. "Sure. Give me some 
time and the right equipment, I can make clones. No problem."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> FZ is a perfect replica of Zardus, Logo, or rather Zardus himself 
from 
> a different time.
> 
> ::FZ::
> 
> FZ nods. "I see. Lady Hawk will be here shortly, a shuttle is on 
the 
> way to pick her up. And I have one more thing to ask you."
> 
> He gestures toward the remains of the two bots, Feline and 
Beholder, 
> "These two were killed in the last battle. Is there any way you can 
> make a functional clone of them?"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > Squizzy::
> > 
> > She looked at FZ. "She said what?!  Steal HER experiments?" She 
felt 
> > her face turn red with anger. "She was asking me to help her on 
the 
> > plans to make the most perfect, genetically engineered, natural 
bot 
> > ever made. And she was going to creat that bot. She said I was 
going 
> > to steal her experiments? I was going to assist her in the 
greatest 
> > sceintific experiment on this planet. How can she say that. I 
> thought 
> > we were friends. I thought she trusted me as I trusted her. And 
then 
> > she attacked me." She paced the floor a bit. "I can't believe 
this. 
> > Tell Zardus that I'll give him the report and all the info I 
have. 
> > Then I'll maek these bots for him and show that little 
featherhead 
> > not to backstab a mongoose like that." She rubbed the spot where 
the 
> > needle had penetrated her s
